statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_taken = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, medication_schedule FROM patient_medication_tracking ORDER BY medication_schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, medication_schedule FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND medication_taken = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE patient_id = '12345678-9abc-def0-1234-56789abcdef0';
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_schedule < NOW() ORDER BY medication_dosage ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medication_taken FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_taken = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%' AND medication_dosage = '100mg';
SELECT patient_id, medication_schedule FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_schedule BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY medication_schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_percentage >= 90;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_percentage FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE dosage = 'Morning';
SELECT * FROM medication_reminders WHERE reminder_time BETWEEN '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT patient_id, reminder_message FROM medication_reminders WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY reminder_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_percentage > 90
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE dosage = '200mg'
SELECT reminder_message, reminder_time FROM medication_reminders WHERE reminder_time < NOW()
SELECT medication_name, adherence_percentage FROM patient_medication_adherence ORDER BY adherence_percentage DESC
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_medication_adherence JOIN medication_reminders ON patient_medication_adherence.patient_id = medication_reminders.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, name FROM Patient ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, condition FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE dosage >= '100mg'
SELECT id, reminder_time FROM Reminder
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE frequency IN ('daily', 'twice daily') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, r.reminder_time FROM Patient p JOIN Medication m ON p.id = m.patient_id JOIN Reminder r ON p.id = r.patient_id ORDER BY r.reminder_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY age ASC, name DESC;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, COUNT(r.id) AS total_reminders FROM Patient p LEFT JOIN Reminder r ON p.id = r.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_reminders >= 3 ORDER BY total_reminders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage, medication_frequency FROM Medications WHERE medication_frequency >= 3;
SELECT reminder_datetime, reminder_message FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_sent = false;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_date FROM Patients JOIN PatientMedicationHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientMedicationHistory.patient_id JOIN Medications ON PatientMedicationHistory.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, heart_condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE medication_dosage LIKE '5mg%';
SELECT medication_name, medication_frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE frequency > 2
SELECT reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time < '2022-01-01'
SELECT nurse_name, specialty FROM nurses
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE cardiac_condition = TRUE
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY frequency ASC

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, log_date FROM patients JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id JOIN medication_logs ON patients.patient_id = medication_logs.patient_id LIMIT 5
SELECT nurse_name, specialty, count(assigned_patients) FROM nurses GROUP BY nurse_name, specialty
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_time DESC
